GSD.description:
tcp: annotate data-race around tcp_md5sig_pool_populated

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 0958e487e81bdb5ca658a3b6e72c8252d6e163f9. For more details please see the references link.
